definition: timely/apt to the occasion/in due course
to fit/suitable/proper/just (now)/comfortable/well/to go/to follow or pursue

sentences.english: We will release information of the visit in due course.
sentences.chinese: 具体的访问情况，我们将适时发布消息。

sentences.english: The ability to make decisions when needed is a must.
sentences.chinese: 适时的决策力是必需的。

sentences.english: Find ways to relax and recharge your batteries.
sentences.chinese: 想办法让自己轻松一点并适时的充充电。

sentences.english: We will issue the statement at an appropriate time. Please keep a close watch.
sentences.chinese: 这一公报会适时发表，请大家及时跟踪。

sentences.english: To cultivate students' mathematics ability by partial intelligence learning course is exceed other instruction mode .
sentences.chinese: 教师对学生使用偏智能学件学习要进行适时指导。

sentences.english: Therefore, to timely collect environmental taxation is imperative.
sentences.chinese: 因而，适时征收环境税已势在必行。

sentences.english: The optimal sowing period and the growth of summer maize are often affected by the high temperature and less rainfall in the early Summer.
sentences.chinese: 初夏高温少雨，常影响夏玉米适时播种和苗期生长。

sentences.english: When I'm not well, I drip.
sentences.chinese: 感到不适时，我就往外滴。

sentences.english: The whole question of what is remembered in time is crucial to Maleonn.
sentences.chinese: 适时记住什么东西，这个问题对于马良来说至关重要。

sentences.english: It will shield buildings too, though, for a suitable consideration.
sentences.chinese: 它也会屏蔽建筑，尽管是出于适时的考虑。

sentences.english: The control precision and instantaneity are improved effectively.
sentences.chinese: 有效地提高了控制精度和适时性。

sentences.english: From that standpoint, we will take necessary measures in a timely fashion, ' Mr. Azumi said during a parliamentary debate.
sentences.chinese: 从这个角度，我们将适时采取必要的举措。

sentences.english: But she definitely moved our understanding of primates further back in time.
sentences.chinese: 但她绝对适时深化了我们对于灵长类的理解。

sentences.english: I'll now call at the vicarage and report to you in due course.
sentences.chinese: 我现在要去教区牧师家拜访，然后适时向你汇报情况。

sentences.english: He got ground-ball double plays when we needed it.
sentences.chinese: 当我们需要时，就适时的出现双杀。

sentences.english: Last but not least, the option of concrete laying mode is timely changing.
sentences.chinese: 混凝土铺筑方式选择是适时变化的。

definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
so that/so as to/in order to
at the earliest possible time/as soon as possible
as far as possible/to do one's utmost
